$  Changed

Function processes macro 'google_map'.

Definition at line 138 of file google_maps.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( strpos( $ProcessingString , '{google_map}' ) !== false )
                        {
                              $ProcessingString = str_replace( '{google_map}' , '{google_map:p=1}' , $ProcessingString );
                        }
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( 
                                                $ProcessingString , 'google_map' , 
                                                      array( 'width' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'height' => TERMINAL_VALUE ) ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              
                              $id = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime( true ) ) );
                              $Height = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'height' , '300px' );
                              $Width = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'width' , '500px' );
                              $Class = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'class' , 'google_map' );

                              $Code = "<div id=\"$id\" class=\"$Class\" style=\"width: $Width; height: $Height;\"></div>";
                              $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{google_map:$MacroParameters}" , $Code , $ProcessingString );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
